articles.title: Separated migrant children may be housed in a quiet building right down the street from you
articles.description: Many neighbors had no idea what the  buildings were, assuming maybe a day-care center or orphanage. Is there one near you?

articles.author: Arizona Republic, Kaila White, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Separated migrant children may be housed in quiet buildings on your block
articles.description: Many neighbors had no idea what the  nondescript buildings were, assuming maybe a day-care center or orphanage. They were surprised to learn they housed minors who entered U.S. without parents or guardians.

articles.title: What's going on in there? Questions arise about migrant kids' welfare
articles.description: As reports surface about problems at  shelters for migrant children, Arizona officials question who is ensuring the kids are safe.
